name: The White Box
description:
Hi everyone, I'm Rachit and this is my first ever published game, The White Box. It's a 1 minute speed-runner, but I learnt a lot of things developing it. I stepped into adding audio, a timer, and some important concepts of C# programming as well. It contains a bug at the end, so please don't mind.  Do give it a shot. Cheers!

controls

A,D- move

R- restart level
